title: O3 Test Automation Enhancement oPOM1_I
description:
Description
Continue Test Automation activities according to O3 Test Strategy described at https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/O3-06-Testing
Test stages in focus:
O3 - Java Unit Tests
O3 - Camunda Process Tests
O3 - API Blackbox and Camunda Integration Test 
Production Lines in scope:
SeCeIT (in Focus for this PI)
FXN and
Order Form
Apart, in order to facilitate testing at development environments prior to CIT2 the use of a mocking framework is to be established. Testing Improvements driven by DevOps/Cagdas:
For each new business case mocks and tests are created as needed (iteratively) - L
Adjust applications to use either mock or actual service on the fly (iteratively) - S
Teams create integrationtests to test their main business functionality - M
Entire Regression Tests are to run on Playground on a daily basis and prior to any PROD deployment on CIT2 for applicable scope as per https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/O3+-+Deployment+Procedure
